qas.question: When was a reprint of a letter sent to The Times appear in Littel's Living Age?
Who was the author of the letter sent to the Times?
What was Thomas Taylor Meadows replying to?

context: In <a0_0>1855<a0_0/> a reprint of a letter earlier sent to The Times appeared in Littel's Living Age. Its author, an "official Chinese interpreter of 10 years' active service" and a member of the Oriental Club, <a1_0>Thomas Taylor Meadows<a1_0/>, was replying to <a2_0>the suggestion by another interpreter<a2_0/> that the British Empire was wasting its resources on a false threat from Russia against China. Toward the end of the letter he said:
